Title: Vintage Collectible Retro Mechanical Pocket Watch Molnija Special Ship Edition
Description: Untitled Document Search Store Include description Visit our Stores Antique Treasure Store Antique Treasure Shop Helpful links Ask Seller a question Follow this Seller Like us on Facebook Categories Paintings & Drawings Statues & Figurines Militaria Swords, Knives & Blades Watches & Clocks Collectible Toys Icons & Crosses Jewelry & Accessories Science & Medicine Photo Cameras Books & Literature Pens & Writing Tobacciana Musical Instruments Primitives & Folklore Other Collectibles Item Description Vintage Collectible Retro Mechanical Pocket Watch Molnija Special Ship Edition Details A special edition of the famous soviet watch Molnija. The mechanism works. Of course, some signs of usage may be noticed here and there. It's normal for its age. The watch is collectible and nice memory from the communist era. REGARDING THE SHIPPING:The watch will be shipped in a specially created for this watch box, this box is highly durable and will withstand weight, pressure, vibrations and any other ways of rough transportation conditions. I will make pictures of the box and watch before shipping it. There will be NO possible way for the watch to get any damage during the transportation. In other words you will receive the watch exactly as it is on the pictures in WORKING CONDITION. All watches I sent are being checked by an official authorized/approved service a day before shipping them. We keep our Items in their authentic condition as we received them. Size: You can see the measurements on the pictures. If you require any more information or pictures please contact us. Item Condition The condition is as you can see it on the pictures. The Retro watch/clock is nicely working (keep in mind that old watches can always show small defects, so please don't expect them to run as they were new). There is always the possibility the mechanism to slow or hasten in time, this can be adjusted manually. Payment We accept payments with PayPal only. Payment must be made within 10 days after the auction is closed. If you need more time, please contact us through eBay's message system. When purchasing multiple items, please wait for combined invoice before paying. Shipping We provide Combined shipping. Please request invoice for multiple purchases. Approximate time of delivery to the USA is 15-30 days. Approximate time of delivery to Europe 10-20 days. Approximate time of delivery to other parts of the world 20-30 days. Handling time is 2-3 days. Tracking info is provided after the items has been handled. Returns If You are unhappy with Your purchase, let us know before leaving feedback and we will resolve any problems with your order. We give you 100% Money Back Guarantee. Buyer should contact seller within 14 Days after receiving the item. The Item must be in its original condition. Refund is given as Money back or exchange (buyer's choice). Return shipping will be paid by the buyer. Contacts Should you have any additional questions regarding the Item, please contact us. We will reply promptly and if you require more pictures or info, our customer support will be happy to oblige.
